data.title: Weber State Athletics
data.meta_description: Carlee Lough (15) Guard - Carlee played four years at Weber State. In her time with the Wildcats she played in 83 career games and started 25 games. 2014-15 ...
data.text:
Carlee played four years at Weber State. In her time with the Wildcats she played in 83 career games and started 25 games.

2014-15 (Senior)

• Saw action in 24 games for the Wildcats and started 14

• Scored a new career-high 20 points in a win against Idaho State

• Shot 70.9 percent from the free throw line, and 27.5 percent from the field.

• Led the team in three-point field goal percentage with 32.7

• Scored in double figures six different times

2013-14 (Junior)

• Saw action in 26 games for the Wildcats.

• Scored a career-high eight points in a win at Northern Arizona.

• Was 7-of-8 from the free throw line on the season.

2012-13 (Sophomore)

• Played in all 29 games for the Wildcats and started in 10 games.

• Averaged 2.7 points and 1.7 rebounds on the year.

• Scored a season-high seven points twice on the year.

2011-12 (Freshman)

• Saw action in four games for the Wildcats during the season.

• Recorded three rebounds on the year.

Fairview High School

• Graduated from Farview High School in Boulder, Colo., in 2011.

• Averaged 11.7 points per game during her senior season, earning first team all-region and all-conference honors, and honorable mention all-state.

• Led her team to the Class 5A Great Eight.

• Played in the 2011 All-Star Showcase.

• Played her club basketball for the Boulder Rockies.
